title: Wipro and IBM collaborate to propel enterprise AI
description:
In a bid to accelerate the adoption of AI in the enterprise sector, Wipro has unveiled its latest offering that leverages the capabilities of IBM’s watsonx AI and data platform. The extended partnership between Wipro and IBM combines the former’s extensive industry expertise with IBM’s leading AI innovations. The collaboration seeks to develop joint solutions... Read more »

The post Wipro and IBM collaborate to propel enterprise AI appeared first on AI News.
